## Prepare

Load required libraries.

```{r}
library(ggtree)
library(treeio)
```


Load metadata.

```{r}
metadata <- read.csv(params$metadata)
metadata$sample <- paste0(metadata$sample, "_T1")
```

Load treefile.

```{r}
tree <- read.newick(params$treefile)
```

plot tree

```{r}
ggplot(tree, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_tree() + 
  theme_tree() +
  geom_tiplab(as_ylab = FALSE, color = '#555555')
```
